title: [b]Output Filetype[/b]
desc:
File extension to use for rendered images.
[b](Default: jpg)[/b]

title: [b]Save Artist Name[/b]
desc:
Include artist in rendered file name, e.g. Assassinate (Kev Walker).jpg
[b](Default: True)[/b]

title: [b]Overwrite Duplicates[/b]
desc:
Overwrite rendered files with identical file names.
[b](Default: True)[/b]

title: [b]Skip Failed Cards[/b]
desc:
Automatically skip failed cards without asking for confirmation.
[b](Default: False)[/b]

title: [b]Force English Formatting[/b]
desc:
Enabling this will force Photoshop text layers to use English formatting.
[b](Default: False)[/b]

title: [b]Targeted Text Replacement[/b]
desc:
Disabling this can fix a crash that occurs on some versions of Photoshop.
Try disabling this if experiencing a crash during the collector info step.
[b](Default: True)[/b]

title: [b]Scryfall Search Ascending[/b]
desc:
When pulling card from Scryfall, search from oldest to most recent.
[b](Default: False)[/b]

title: [b]Development Testing Mode[/b]
desc:
Enabling this will change the GUI into a simple testing interface.
[b]This setting must be changed manually.[/b]
